titleStmt.title: An addition declaratorie to the bulles, with a searching of the maze Scene [sic] and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: "The second bull is Regnans in excelsis"--STC.
